issue.title: Python: Provide redistributable pyarrow wheels on OSX
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-579](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-579). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently wheels build on OSX cannot be passed between different machines as they link to system installed libraries. There are tools to ease building these wheels (e.g. https://pypi.python.org/pypi/delocate ) but they currently don't work well with `pyarrow`.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-579?focusedCommentId=16027487) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
We have unofficial builds at https://github.com/xhochy/pyarrow-macos-wheels
